# Descriptive Statistics

A descriptive statistic is a summary statistic that quantitatively describes or summarizes features of a collection of information, while descriptive statistics is the process of using and analyzing those statistics.\

## Frequency Analysis

After Importing your data set, and providing names to variables, click on:\

::: {style="text-align: center;"}
[ANALYZE → DESCRIPTIVE STATISTICS → FREQUENCIES]{style="color:red;"}
:::

Choose any variables to be analyzed and place them in box on right\
Options include (For Categorical Variables):\

- Frequency Tables\
- Pie Charts, Bar Charts\
